column5: i know that there is a limit on alcohol and tobacco that one can bring into Canada duty free but is there any limit on soda?
i know that there is a limit on alcohol and tobacco that one can bring into Canada duty free but is there any limit on soda?

[font color=green size=3][b]You wouldn't want to have a vast quanity beyond what would be beleivable that the party could consume. Customs would think you were importing for resale or as gift, then they would want you to pay duty. Wish'in I was fish'in on Wabby
